name: Brand Recognition
copy: An interactive quiz built using VueJS. Can you guess 15 of the worldâ€™s top brands from just a small crop of their logo?

name: British Sign Language Quiz
copy: See how familiar you are with British Sign Language by taking this interactive quiz. Built using VueJS.

name: First Home Hotspots
copy: An interactive map built with VueJS. It allows you to select a location in the UK, and explore the property market to discover why the area is such a hotspot for first-time buyers.

name: Jane Tomlinson Appeal
copy: A charity dedicated to helping children with cancer. Worked on the front end to create reusable HTML modules for integration in to Umbraco by the back end developer.

name: Insurance2go
copy: Instant quotes and insurance for mobile phones. Worked on the front end to create reusable HTML modules for integration in to Umbraco by the back end developer.

name: M88 Casino Landing Pages
copy: A collection of multilingual animated landing pages, interactivity added using GSAP. Final version used PHP to get live data from an API. I've made available the stripped down, HTML, English only version.

name: Zephyr Home Loans
copy: A WordPress site for a buy-to-let lender for mortgage intermediaires. Built from scratch using Advanced Custom Fields.
